thread.title: Siege at Buderim as armed man in standoff with police | The Courier-Mail

title: Siege at Buderim as armed man in standoff with police | The Courier-Mail
text:
Siege at Buderim as armed man in standoff with police Madura McCormack, The Courier-Mail February 7, 2017 9:36pm 
A STANDOFF between police and an armed man have shut down a number of Sunshine Coast streets tonight. 
Police are currently on scene in Buderim after a man, possibly armed with guns and knives, was seen making threats at an address on Goshawk Boulevard around 5.45pm. 
An emergency situation has been declared and people are being asked to avoid the area near Stringybark Road, Goshawk Boulevard and Toral Drive. Most viewed
